description: This course studies theater performance through the full-scale mounting of a production
during the month of January, followed by public performances at the beginning of Spring
Semester. Students enroll in the class through either an acting audition or a production
position interview held in late October or early November. No previous experience is
necessary. Selected participants are notified prior to Interim registration. Details about the
audition/interview and scripts are available by calling the Theatre Department Office, x3240.
